title: Vice Minister of Culture and Tourism under investigation
content:
BEIJING, July 29 (Xinhua) -- Vice Minister of Culture and Tourism Li Jinzao is being investigated for suspected serious violations of discipline and law, China's top anti-graft body said on Wednesday.
The investigation into Li, who is also deputy secretary of the leading Party members' group of the Ministry of Culture and Tourism, is being carried out by the Communist Party of China Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission. Enditem
